operations.title: 一鍵報工
operations.operateScript: (data) => { var today = new Date(); if (data.actual_start_date == '' || data.actual_start_date == null) { let tempPlanStartDate = new Date(data.plan_start_date); if (tempPlanStartDate > today) { tempPlanStartDate = today.getFullYear() + '/' + (today.getMonth() + 1) + '/' + today.getDate(); } else { tempPlanStartDate = tempPlanStartDate.getFullYear() + '/' + (tempPlanStartDate.getMonth() + 1) + '/' + tempPlanStartDate.getDate(); } data.actual_start_date = tempPlanStartDate; } data.complete_rate = 1; data.actual_finish_date = today.getFullYear() + '/' + (today.getMonth() + 1) + '/' + today.getDate(); data.main_unit_actual_value = (data.plan_main_unit_value - data.complete_main_unit_value).toFixed(3); let tempSecondValue = (data.plan_second_unit_value - data.complete_second_unit_value).toFixed(3); if (tempSecondValue < 0) { tempSecondValue = 0; } data.second_unit_actual_value = tempSecondValue; }

operations.title: 一鍵報工
operations.operateScript: (data) => { var today = new Date(); if (data.actual_start_date == '' || data.actual_start_date == null) { let tempPlanStartDate = new Date(data.plan_start_date); if (tempPlanStartDate > today) { tempPlanStartDate = today.getFullYear() + '/' + (today.getMonth() + 1) + '/' + today.getDate(); } else { tempPlanStartDate = tempPlanStartDate.getFullYear() + '/' + (tempPlanStartDate.getMonth() + 1) + '/' + tempPlanStartDate.getDate(); } data.actual_start_date = tempPlanStartDate; } data.complete_rate = 1; data.actual_finish_date = today.getFullYear() + '/' + (today.getMonth() + 1) + '/' + today.getDate(); data.main_unit_actual_value = (data.plan_main_unit_value - data.complete_main_unit_value).toFixed(3); let tempSecondValue = (data.plan_second_unit_value - data.complete_second_unit_value).toFixed(3); if (tempSecondValue < 0) { tempSecondValue = 0; } data.second_unit_actual_value = tempSecondValue; }

columnDefs.description:
主單位=無，完成率需手動輸入
主單位<>無，完成率=（實際值(主單位)+已完成(主單位)）/預計值(主單位)

operations.name: disabledDate
operations.script: (current) => { let actual_start_date = relationControl.parent.value.actual_start_date; if (typeof actual_start_date === 'string') { actual_start_date = new Date(actual_start_date); } var today = new Date(); return (current > today || current < actual_start_date); }

operations.script: let tmain_unit_actual_value = relationControl.parent.value.main_unit_actual_value; if(typeof tmain_unit_actual_value === 'string'){tmain_unit_actual_value=parseFloat(tmain_unit_actual_value);} let tcomplete_main_unit_value = relationControl.parent.value.complete_main_unit_value; if(typeof tcomplete_main_unit_value === 'string'){tcomplete_main_unit_value=parseFloat(tcomplete_main_unit_value);} let tplan_main_unit_value = relationControl.parent.value.plan_main_unit_value; if(typeof tplan_main_unit_value === 'string'){tplan_main_unit_value=parseFloat(tplan_main_unit_value);} let tRate = (tmain_unit_actual_value + tcomplete_main_unit_value) / tplan_main_unit_value; if (tRate >= 1) { relationControl.parent.get('complete_rate').setValue(1); } else { tRate = tRate.toFixed(4); relationControl.parent.get('complete_rate').setValue(tRate); }
